text: Irayi Kunnathidathil Kumaran Master (; 17 September 1903 – 27 July 1999), was a freedom fighter from Mahe or Mayyazhi, Union territory of India, who fought for liberation from France, in 1954. He also unsuccessfully fought for the unification of Mayyazhi with Kerala.He is known as Mahe Gandhi. Kumaran was the first Administrator of Mahe after Indian independence. ==External links== * Indian Express News * http://pib.nic.in/feature/feyr98/fe0898/f1808986.html * http://mahewelfare.com/tourism/default.asp?Ar=Personality&Gr;=5 Category:1903 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Indian civil rights activists Category:Indian independence activists from Kerala Category:Narayana Guru Category:Malayali people Category:Administrators of Mahe
title: I. K. Kumaran
